about.name: Shambhavee Pandey
about.title: BIM & Solution Specialist
about.summary: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love building scalable applications and solving complex problems through creative solutions.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and advanced product filtering. Built with modern web technologies and optimized for performance.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team workspaces, and integrated notifications. Features drag-and-drop boards and advanced filtering capabilities.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather application providing real-time forecasts, historical data analysis, and location-based recommendations. Integrates with multiple weather APIs for accurate predictions.

projects.title: Social Media Analytics
projects.description: An analytics dashboard for tracking social media performance across multiple platforms. Provides detailed metrics, engagement analysis, and automated reporting with data visualization.

caseStudies.title: Scaling E-Commerce to 100K Users
caseStudies.subtitle: Performance Optimization & Infrastructure
caseStudies.challenge: The e-commerce platform was experiencing severe performance issues with database queries taking 5+ seconds. User abandonment rate increased by 35% during peak traffic periods.
caseStudies.solution: Implemented database indexing, Redis caching layer, and CDN optimization. Refactored the product listing API with pagination and lazy loading. Deployed load balancing across multiple instances.
results: Reduced page load time from 5s to 800ms (84% improvement)

caseStudies.title: Real-Time Collaboration Platform
caseStudies.subtitle: WebSocket Architecture & Data Synchronization
caseStudies.challenge: Building a real-time document collaboration tool that could handle 500+ concurrent editors while maintaining data consistency and preventing conflicts.
caseStudies.solution: Implemented WebSocket-based architecture with operational transformation for conflict resolution. Built custom synchronization protocol with delta compression. Used event sourcing for audit trail.
results: Network bandwidth reduced by 65% using delta compression

caseStudies.title: Analytics Dashboard Redesign
caseStudies.subtitle: Data Visualization & Performance
caseStudies.challenge: Legacy dashboard took 45 seconds to load with 2MB+ of data transferred. Stakeholders needed real-time insights across 20+ metrics.
caseStudies.solution: Rebuilt with React and D3.js for better performance. Implemented server-side aggregation and caching. Added real-time updates via WebSocket. Created custom visualizations for business metrics.

architecturalDesign.title: Skyline Towers
architecturalDesign.subtitle: Mixed-Use High Rise Housing
architecturalDesign.concept: A contemporary mixed-use development featuring 45-story residential towers integrated with retail and cultural spaces. Designed with sustainable building practices and modern architectural aesthetics.

architecturalDesign.title: Central Park Development
architecturalDesign.subtitle: Urban Mixed-Use Redevelopment
architecturalDesign.concept: Comprehensive urban redevelopment project transforming 15 acres into a vibrant mixed-use district with residential, commercial, and public spaces. Focus on pedestrian-friendly design and community integration.

architecturalDesign.title: Vertical Garden Complex
architecturalDesign.subtitle: Sustainable Residential Tower
architecturalDesign.concept: Eco-friendly 35-story residential tower featuring integrated vertical gardens, green roofs, and sustainable energy systems. Design emphasizes biophilic architecture and environmental responsibility.

architecturalDesign.title: Tech Innovation Hub
architecturalDesign.subtitle: Corporate Campus Master Plan
architecturalDesign.concept: State-of-the-art corporate campus featuring flexible office spaces, innovation labs, and employee wellness facilities. Design promotes collaboration and creativity through open-plan architecture.

architecturalDesign.title: Waterfront Promenade
architecturalDesign.subtitle: Mixed-Use Waterfront Development
architecturalDesign.concept: 2-mile waterfront development featuring residential towers, cultural venues, restaurants, and public gathering spaces. Design emphasizes water access and scenic views with sustainable waterfront management.

architecturalDesign.title: Thesis Project: Adaptive Reuse
architecturalDesign.subtitle: Historic Building Transformation
architecturalDesign.concept: Master's thesis exploring adaptive reuse of historic industrial buildings into modern mixed-use spaces. Project combines heritage preservation with contemporary design principles and sustainable retrofitting.
